hero.title: Real-Time Air Quality
hero.subtitle: Monitoring for Dynamic Environments
hero.description: Autonomous real-time air quality monitoring for buses, metros, and trolleybuses.

dashboard.title: Cloud-Connected Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor air quality metrics in real-time across your entire fleet
dashboard.chartDescription: PM2.5 and CO₂ levels over the last 10 minutes

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.description: Four-layer architecture: mobile sensing, wireless communication, cloud infrastructure, and ML analytics
architecture.layer1Description: Tynys IoT device with Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W. CO₂, PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity sensors. 60s sampling with 5-point moving average filter.
architecture.layer2Description: MQTT over Wi-Fi. Buffer-based fallback preserves data during connectivity interruptions, ensuring temporal continuity.
architecture.layer3Description: Structured SQL database and web dashboard. Real-time visualization with filtering by location, timestamp, and transport type.
architecture.layer4Description: Pollution classification using logistic regression, decision tree, random forest, and XGBoost. Real-time predictions and anomaly detection.

features.title: Validated Performance
features.description: Benchmarked against Qingping Air Quality Monitor Gen 2 with strong correlation (R² = 0.89–0.95 for PM2.5)
features.logisticDescription: Binary classification for pollution threshold detection
features.randomForestDescription: Ensemble learning for multi-class pollution categorization

cta.title: Deploy Tynys Across Your Fleet
cta.description: Autonomous air quality monitoring for buses, metros, and trolleybuses with cloud-connected analytics

footer.description: Autonomous real-time air quality monitoring for buses, metros, and trolleybuses
